cab.content: Military Secret.1259297IFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,' l&h January 1920.(Received 16th.)482. Malleson wires 12tli January repeating Tehran that reports indicate thatinspired by moderating influences from Moscow the Bolsheviks are now seeking to conciliate Turcomans, and in order to persuade them to renew cultivation have given them satisfactory assurances on the land question. Frightfulness and aggressionhave given way to a desire to obtain recognition by lenient methods.\
